import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Menu from './Menu'; const CreatePost = () => { let userName = 'SoAndSo'; let userLocation = 'Rich people apartments, Muyenga'; let isDonating = false; let handleSubmit = () => {}; let handleAddInput = () => {}; return (
{userName} from {userLocation} is {isDonating ? 'donating' : 'requesting'}:
{' '}
); }; export default CreatePost;
